messages.title: TIME FOR A GREEN, FAIR SOCIETY

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The global economic collapse was not just the failure of a few irresponsible bankers but the result of the misguided policies of generations of politicians. For years our Government, firstly the Conservatives and then Labour, have followed economic policies which favour the interests of multinational corporations over those of ordinary people. But these policies are unsustainable, putting short term profits for a tiny elite before the long terms needs of the people and the planet.

The Green New Deal will put massive investment into green technologies to create many thousands of new jobs, boosting our economy with worthwhile and productive economic activity, as well as helping to combat the threat of climate change. There would also be investment in the public infrastructure such as hospitals and schools. The Greens believe economics should work for, not against, the people.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: our Government, firstly the Conservatives and then Labour

issues.economy: The global economic collapse was not just the failure of a few irresponsible bankers but the result of the misguided policies of generations of politicians.
issues.environment: helping to combat the threat of climate change.
